A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Stray too much from the Lucas formula & people lose their minds. Play it safe and stick to the same old schtick & feel the wrath of the same ones that complain. You can't make everyone happy\, but this movie is by far on my top 3 of Star Wars movies. While it doesn't give answers away that some wanted\, the movie is itself enjoyable and hits all the right buttons throughout. I'm surprised by the feedback so far\, but it seems like everyone is a critic nowadays. Nitpicking is the cool thing to do.
